text: I'm the chief strategy and digital

really monolith uh you know
140 plus Legacy systems that all have

the larger challenges that we have as
well essentially if you look at the way
all of our systems move to the cloud
it's very under the radar right it
doesn't actually affect the user as such
so in a lot of ways we've actually taken
a very pragmatic view to saying hey uh
let's actually make sure that we prepare
people only when they really need to be
prepared and therefore what's happened
is we've made incredible progress in a
very short period of time in about eight

impacting the user we had a little bit
of a unique situation in the sense that
uh you know we had a hardware
requirement coming up for the on-prem

little bit of a you know between a rock

move to the cloud where we are right now

all of them being Cloud native which is

what is their purpose and how do we

Nimble traditional e-commerce companies

sagemaker as an example as an MLA we've
been able to bring down our predictions
